name: Bonsly
clearingStrategy:
No Disruption and too many weakness.
This stage is easy to beat
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
If it is too much, Super Effective from
later Pokemons will do.

name: Gastly
disruptions:
Board: 3rd Row is Metal Blocks, 6 Gastly
           and 4th-6th row is in Barrier except 
           for the Gastly
Initial: None
Timer: None

Notes: Adds 3 Gastly if the dropped
           Pokemon doesn't make a 4+ line
clearingStrategy:
Turning into Gastly does help you (it
can even be Spooked by its own
disruption), Just keep on your combo
at the top
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 5 moves left
Move+5 is a sure S-Rank. If you dont wish
to use, Mega Gengar team with Gastly
will also do

name: Marshtomp
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Metal Blocks
Timer: Adds 5 Metal Blocks every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
A little bit difficult with the Disruption.
Audino and Kangaskhan help in
clearing the field
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
Stages from this point needs half to S-Rank
unlike the last stages... Move+5 will help
in here if you are having trouble

name: Dratini
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Dratini
Timer: Adds 5 Dratini every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
Very easy. Dratini Disruptions are 
Super Effective against it. You can
finish this within 1-2 turns
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 3 moves left
Easy S-Rank. Your first try will do this

name: Amaura
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 3 Metal Blocks every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
Much like Marshtomp stage except
this one only cast 3 blocks. Use same
strategy. Klefki also has
Block Smash if you need
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
You can use Move+5 to S-Rank it or
try later with better team

name: Combusken
disruptions:
Board: 4 Rocks
Initial: None
Timer: None
clearingStrategy:
Move F3 (the Last Phanpy in the 3rd
row) to D4 (replacing Lopunny) to
trigger a combo that will end this
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 2 moves left
Clearing Strategy will S-Rank this

name: Meowstic M
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 3 Meowstic M after 3 turns.
           Adds 2 Barrier after 2 turns
           Repeat
clearingStrategy:
Simple stage. Just watch out for the
different disruptions
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
Move+5 for easy S-Rank or wait for a while
for stronger teams

name: Togetic
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Togetic
Timer: Adds 5 Togetic every 3 turns
clearingStrategy: Very easy stage. Not much to say
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 3 moves left
You can do this in 2 moves. No need to use
items.

name: Slowbro
disruptions:
Board: 4 Rocks, 10 Slowpoke, 8 Slowbro
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 2 Slowbro every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
Havent figure out how to clear all
Slowbro and Slowpoke here. 

Move E5 to E4 to remove most
Slowpokes and Slowbro. (About 8
will left)
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 3 moves left
Move+5 for guarantee S-Rank.
notes:
Low capture rate. But if catch this,
you'll be able to use Mega Slowbro
to battle

name: Umbreon
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 2 Umbreon every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
Same stage as the other. Make use of
Crowd Control here
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
If you can get Lucario now, good. 
Otherwise, Move+5 will do

name: Espeon
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Barrier
Timer: Adds 5 Barrier every 3 turns
clearingStrategy:
Very high Hit Points and not so good
Disruption. Try to clear those at the top
when it get Barrier first
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
Mega Gengar Team or if you can risk, add
Move+5 to your team

name: Grovyle
disruptions:
Board: 5th Column all Metal Blocks,
           9 Treecko, and 9 Rocks
Initial: None
Timer: None
clearingStrategy:
Move C1 to C2

The next step is now random. You
may try:

D4 to C3
E2 to D6
D6 to F3
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 2 moves left
Clearing Strategy will S-Rank this

name: Swellow
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 8 moves left
You can S-Rank it using the team you
are using. If not, level up a bit

name: Cubone
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 5 Rocks after 3 turns.
           Adds 3 Cubones after 3 turns.
           Repeat
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
Itemless can do this

name: Mega Altaria
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Rocks
Timer: Adds 5 Rocks every 3 turns.
          Adds 1 Column of Metal Blocks
          after 2 turns. Repeat
clearingStrategy:
Try Mega Kangaskhan or Mega Audino
here to destroy the blocks. When the
field is cleared/open try to combo your
Super Effectives
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 10 moves left

You can do this without items when you
have M-Glalie or M-Altaria.

Mega Altaria is good for this stage. You can
add Mega Start or Move+5 if you can
afford
notes:
6th Mega Stone. Have to wait for
Altaria though
